phrases: We are going to be caught at this rate!
Natsu, hurry up and get them!
And wait, why can you use it?
You are the only one who can use magic, Lucy-san!
Gate of the Ram, I open thee!
YOU-Um... I will do my best...
I have never seen magic like that before!
I feel like a new man...
Even though we are getting beat...
I could get used to this...
Did I do a good job?
Ah, I think I feel good, too!
We should be okay after running this far, right?
But, how did you get to Edolas?
We were all worried that you would been turned into a lacrima, Lucy-san.
It was quite sudden, and I did not have time to explain.
I am the one who saved you, Lucy-sama.
I sensed a fluctuation in space-time.
I appeared without you summoning me,
and took you inside of me.
Where is Natsu, Erza, Gray, Wendy, and the others?
I apologize, but I do not understand what has happened myself.
This is the first time we have greeted each other, yes?
So that means he is safe, too?
Then, he explained what was going on to me.
What the heck are you talking about?
There is not time for a thorough explanation.
If we do not hurry, the entrance to Edolas will seal off.
You want me to go to this Edolas place?
I want you to save our friends.
I will search for anyone else who may have survived.
I do not have time to explain.
I am counting on you, Lucy...
Since then, I have been searching the whole time for someone I know.
I wonder why Mystogan-san knew about Edolas?
He did not say anything at all...
Why is it that you are the only one who can use magic here, Lucy?
Maybe it is because I am like, the legendary chosen warrior!
If you cannot use magic, Natsu, then we are going to be at a real disadvantage...
You people seriously plan to go against the Kingdom?
We will do it for our friends!
You cannot even use magic for real, and you are fighting the Kingdom?
Leave everything to Fairy Tail's (Currently) Strongest Wizard!
I cannot believe I am saying this...
Maybe these guys can actually change the world?
This is a map of Edolas I borrowed from the hotel.
The geography is not all that different from Earthland...
We were chased by the frog around here...
We ran into Lucy in the city of Louen.
And this is the city we are in now, Sycca.
Over here is the Royal City we are heading toward.
It is still quite a long way...
Plus, we have to be careful not to be discovered by the Royal Army...
How long will it take to get there?
She is exactly the same as me!
Do not go prancing around in a towel!
Edo-Lucy-san, Natsu-san is here, you know!
You are in high spirits, Doublucy!
Are you actually proud of that joke?
You are trying to joke that Edo-Lucy's got a better figure than me, right?
Do not take a bath together, sheesh!
They are so alike it is hard to even tell them apart...
I could not believe we even have the same ass.
I bet you could do mirror acts and stuff!
They are like two peas in a pod...
Actually, it is like Gemini was summoned!
They are a Spirit that I have a contract with!
They can transform to look exactly like another person!
Gate of the Twins, I open thee!
We could do one of those party quiz games now!
Quiz: Who is the real thing?
Now, which one is the real one?
And could you put some clothes on already?
It is only two of you now, but it is still hard to tell you apart.
If I remember right, there was a Spirit that could change your hairstyle, right?
Let us ask the Spirit of the Crab!
It is nice seeing you again-ebi.
He is a Crab Spirit, but ends his sentences with -ebi?
I knew you would point that out!
Yeah, this should make things a lot simpler.
Are you sure it is okay being this short?
Is there a custom on Earthland about taking care of your hair, too?
Well, all girls think like that-ebi.
You would just be stupid to think of being a boy or a girl in this world...
We have got enough to handle just surviving...
But everyone in the guild here looked like they were having fun...
If we did not force ourselves to keep laughing, our hearts would break just like that...
Plus, there are people who still need us, even in this world.
So, even if we are now Dark, we are got to keep the guild going.
But I guess that by itself is not going to cut it...
Do you have to be so hyped up this early in the morning?
If you walk for three days to the east, you will reach the Royal City.
I am returning to the guild.
I wish you the best of luck.
I thought she was going to help us!
The same nerve as you Lucy, right?
We cannot do anything about it.
She said she did not intend to fight from the start.
I would not forgive myself, so I will not forgive her!
Do I really think those people can change the world?
What silly nonsense was I thinking...?
If I really want to change the world, what is the point if we do not do it ourselves?
It will be great if they can use their power to save their friends,
but that will be difficult against the Kingdom.
So I am going to go back to the guild and convince everyone.
Sounds like they are going to start extracting the magic power from that lacrima in two days.
I do not really get it,
but you are talking about all the magic power they scooped up from that other world, right?
Is this really going to be okay?
I just hope nothing screwy happens as a result...
Are you saying there is something wrong with the King's methods?
Oh no, I did not mean that...
We should just leave this all to His Highness.
People like us worryin' are not going to do anything.
She is already back in high spirits.
She is happy she found that rare book at the bookstore, right?
What kind of book did you buy?
A book on the history of this world!
I bet you guys want to learn about this world too, right?
For example, the Exceed race is written about in here...
I would like to know about that, too.
They seem like a race that is extremely feared, though...
I said I do not care.
They are finally going to extract the magic power
from that giant lacrima the day after tomorrow!
And so that is why we have been put on guard duty.
You do not get on board, you will miss the event of a lifetime!
They are extracting the magic power two days from now?
We will not make it in time if we walk!
If they start extracting the magic power, everyone will be gone for good.
Normally, that is not necessary, right?
Just sneaking on board should be fine!
It is rare for you to suggest transportation, Natsu...
As long as I have Wendy's Troia, riding stuff is...
Well, I vote we do it!
We will not make it otherwise, right?
I am the strongest right now!
I figured it out when fighting in Louen.
Basically, magic is more advanced on Earthland than it is here.
Gate of the Lion, I open thee!
Brother is on a date, and cannot be summoned at the moment.
Leo-sama requested I address him that way earlier.
I figured that Loke would beat them all!
With your permission, if I use my full power...
Lucy, what if you bring out Aquarius?
Guess we have no choice, but to play by their rules...
I know how to use it now!
The magic we bought in the black market!
Natsu and Wendy are completely useless!
We will never make it unless we get on board!
So in other words, you were sent here to this world by a certain Mystogan-san?
He gave me a brief explanation.
But I do not really understand things over here.
This is a most interesting tale.
Tell me something, me who is from this world...
What is it, myself from that other world?
You are a freelance writer here in Edolas, right?
My job is to investigate thoroughly what happens in this world and to write about it.
You seem to have a lot of enemies out there.
I was attacked by some strange guys who mistook me for you.
I do very much apologize for causing you such trouble.
There are indeed those who consider me quite the eyesore.
Since I write about things which are not in the Kingdom or government's favor.
However, I do not write articles which are false.
I heard that there was a lot different between this and my original world.
But we are not that different after all, are we?
You are polite and cultured, just like me!
And I think your wild and cool charms are precisely like my own!
You should know that I am very talented at singing and musical instruments.
That is another thing we have in common!
A number of my buddies should be coming through here.
I am sure they will because a big commotion before long.
I will let you know right away.
My information network has its fingers even inside the Kingdom and the Exceed...
We will make our move based on that.
You are going to the Royal City, right?
This will be faster than that beat-up airship.
The fastest man in Fairy Tail...
And that is the other me?
Is that really supposed to be me?
Just like my nickname, Fireball, I am a wizard that specializes in deliveries.
This magic 4-wheeler does not have a SE plug!
It is a device that converts the magic power of the driver into fuel.
People do not have magic power themselves here,
so there is no point having a SE plug.
So then it just runs on magic alone?
Looks like Edolas's cars are way more advanced than Earthland's...
Hey, what was that all of a sudden?
As magic power is a limited resource, so is the magic power for fuel.
It is tricky to get now.
So, this is as far as I take you.
If I go any further, I will not make it back to the guild.
They went and transferred somewhere again...
Looks like the other me catches on fast!
Go right ahead and fight against the Kingdom...
But do not get us involved.
Since the Lucy I know asked me, I lent you a hand.
But I am not going to get my hands dirty.
I just want to continue cruising...
Hey, what the hell are you...
I have something to say to you, other me!
How can you handle transportation like that?!
Oh yeah, this is your homeland, right, Happy?
I was still in an egg back then.
Wait, then why does Carla know a bunch of stuff?
But my only homeland is Earthland's Fairy Tail!
I wonder if my approval rating just went up?
